bibl.title: Territory of Washington v. A.N. James. Judgement
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: Teritory of Washington County of Jefferson } ss
To the sheriff of said County

There was Judgement against A. N. Jones for the sum of $29.90 one for 19.05 costs of suit was recorded on the 29th day of July 1867 before the one of the Justice of th peace in and for said county at the suit of H L Jibbes and an execution against his penalty returned unsatisfied and an affidavit has been filed that said A. N. Jones is about to leave the Territory, these are-therefore, in the name of the United States to command you to take the body of the said A.N. Jones, and hereby convery and deliver to the keeper of the jail of said county, who is herby commanded to recive and keep the said A. N. Jones in a safe custofy in prison, until the aforsaid and all legal expenses- be paid and satisfied unitl he be discharged thereby one course of law and
and of this wil make due return
Given under my hand this 21st day of April 1869
Hereby sertify that the writting is a true and correct copy of the one final wxwxution by which the within named A.N. Jones is held in my custody
